scripts.build: npm run build:check && NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.server:check: curl -s http://localhost:3333/episodes > /dev/null && echo 'Servidor rodando' || echo 'Servidor não responde'
scripts.check:server: curl -s http://localhost:3333/episodes > /dev/null || (echo 'Servidor JSON não está rodando. Iniciando...' && npm run server:start && sleep 8)
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy to GitHub Pages" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: npm run build && npm run export && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out
